data.title: We Attack With Fire And Ice - A Knattspyrnuf?lag Reykjav?kur Story
data.meta_description:
July
A few poor results this month.
We suffer a shock loss to an ex-KR player :S.

July Fixtures

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur  5-0  Stjarnan  (Icelandic...
data.text:
View attachment 372920

July

A few poor results this month.

We suffer a shock loss to an ex-KR player :S.

July Fixtures

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 5-0 Stjarnan (Icelandic Premier League)View attachment 372919

A good performance here. Striker 'Dusan Marinkovic' scored a hat-trick in a rare start for us.

Fimleikafelag Hafnarfjardar 0-0 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372918

Very disappointing that we could only manage a draw against 'FH'. We had enough chances to win by a few goals but we failed to put away our chances.

Grindavik 2-1 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372917

Remember 'Johann Laxdal'? The right-back I bought in my first season. He's now managing Grindavik, and he somehow managed to beat me, his former boss... And no I didn't let him win.

Fram 0-1 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372916

Back to winning ways with a 1-0 win over Fram. 'Olli Nygard' with the only goal of the game.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 5-0 Selfoss (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372915

A good performance here with a 5-0 over Selfoss.

KFR Hvolsvollur 0-4 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Icelandic Cup 4th Round)

View attachment 372914

Another side I've never heard of. I played a weakened team and we won comfortably as expected.

Throttur R. 0-7 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Icelandic Cup Quarter Finals)

View attachment 372913

Another game against a much weaker side in the Icelandic Cup. I again fielded a weakened side, and won with ease. We played very well.

Icelandic Premier League

View attachment 372912

Despite a few slip-ups this month, we are still 7 points clear at the top of the league, and should end up winning it by a fairly large margin.

Player Of The Month

View attachment 372911

Striker 'Dusan Marinkovic was our best player this month. He doesn't usually start, but he got a few chances this month, and impressed.

What To Expect In The Next Update

Who do we get in our Champions League Group?

Will we finally get anything decent from our youth intake?

View attachment 372910

August

We finally got a decent youth intake .

We were 2nd seeds in the Champions League again.

We didn't have to qualify for the group stages this year.

August Fixtures

Breidablik 1-3 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372909

An expected 3-1 win over Breidablik.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 2-0 Fram (Icelandic Cup Semi-Finals)

View attachment 372908

We overcame Fram to make the finals of the Icelandic Cup where we will face Stjarnan.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 4-1 Stjarnan (Icelandic Cup Finals)*****FINALS*****

View attachment 372907

A good performance here as we win the Icelandic Cup with a 4-1 win over Stjarnan.

Haukar 1-4 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372906

An easy win over a relegation threatened Haukar side.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 2-2 Fjolnir (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372905

A poor performance and result. We went into half-time in shock at the fact we were 2-0 down. We fought back to a 2-2 draw, but i'm still disappointed.

Icelandic Premier League Table

View attachment 372904

After we dropped a couple of points in the league this month, our lead was reduced to 5 points, as Fram won every game this month.

Player Of The Month

View attachment 372903

Tor Skippervik was our best player this month.

Champions League Group Stage

View attachment 372897 View attachment 372910 View attachment 605494 View attachment 372902

Bayern Munich................Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur................Rangers FC.......................CFR Cluj

For the 2nd season in a row we were drawn as 2nd seeds, and I expect to finish 2nd. Rangers are not a bad side, but we are better and i'm confident we will finish above them.

Youth Intake

View attachment 372900 View attachment 372899

It really wasn't a bad youth intake this year. Striker 'Julius Fridriksson' was the best prospect & attacking midfielder 'Orri Jakobsson' also looks like becoming a good player.

Transfer Center

View attachment 372898

Not much has been happening on the transfer front. The only move of note was midfielder 'Marius Blokhus' joining dutch side 'NEC Nijmegan' for a fee of ?2mil. He was only ever a backup player for us.

What To Expect In The Next Update

How many points will we win the league by this year?

View attachment 372785

September

We win all our league games this month.

We lose our first group game in the Champions League to Bayern Munich.

September Fixtures

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 5-0 Vikingur R. (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372784

An easy win for us against a relegation threatened side.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 3-0 Valur (Icelandic Premier league)

View attachment 372782

A good performance. We comfortably beat Valur 3-0.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 0-2 Bayern Munich (Champions League Group A)

View attachment 372780

Bayern Munich were just too strong for us. We didn't really trouble the German giants very much.

Stjarnan 3-5 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372779

I imagine this was a very entertaining game for the fans. We wen't into a 3-0 lead, but somehow we managed to let it slip, and we dropped down to 3-3 which was disappointing. We ended up winning 5-3 in the end.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 4-1 Fimleikafelag Hafnarfjardar (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372775

A strong performance here as we beat 'FH' convincingly. 'Tor Skippervik' scored a hat-trick in the process.

Vikingur O' 0-3 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372774

With this comfortable win over 'Vikingur O' we confirm we have won the league with a game to spare. I would have rathered had the league wrapped up earlier than this, but the main thing is we won the league.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 5-2 Grindavik (Icelandic Premier League)

View attachment 372773

A good performance to end the league campaign. Striker Gudmundur Kolbeinsson who hasn't played that much this season scored 4 of our goals.

Icelandic Premier League Table

View attachment 372762

We end up winning the league by 5 points. We were never really in danger of losing the league.

Player Of The Month

View attachment 372756

Tor Skippervik was our best player this month. The striker has been in great form this season.

What To Expect In The Next Update

A review of this season.

Hey !

You still don't manage the national team ?

What is its ranking by now ?

I hope you'll reach Champions League's semi-final this year!

Nope. I don't really want to manage the national team at the moment. The side is pretty woeful at the moment, and the fact I don't have that many Icelandic internationals at KR makes me even less motivated to go for the national job.

Iceland are currently ranked 100th place which is pathetic, especially as about 5-6 years ago (when I had quite a few Icelandic internationals at KR) they were ranked around 35th-40th.

I really want to challenge for the CL this year, and I feel we could challenge for it if we're at our best (and we don't draw Monaco who I just can't seem to beat :S)

View attachment 369526

Season Review

We won the quadruple again as expected.

Fram did manage to put in a slight challenge for the title.

I do hope to win the win the Champions League soon, but we seem to always struggle once we get past the group stages.

Stats

View attachment 369525

'Olli Nygard' was our top goal scorer in the league with 15 goals. 'Tor Skippervik' was close behind with 14 league goals.

'Tor Skippervik' had an average rating of 8.45 which was the best in the league & a new record high for the league.

'Tor Skippervik' was also our assist leader, creating 14 goals during the league campaign.

Fair Play Award

View attachment 369523

Fram won the fair play award this year. We were 2nd. We are almost always in the top 3 for this which is good. We play fair and win fair .

Team Of The Year

View attachment 369515

We had 5 players in the team of the year. Espen Falch-Olsen, Patrick Knudsen, Joseph Okafor, Jorgen Bertilsson & Olli Nygard made the team of the year.

Manager Of The Year

View attachment 369514

I won the manager of the year award.

Our Player Of The Year

View attachment 369513 View attachment 369512

Jorgen Bertilsson was our player of the year, and also won the Icelandic player of the year award. The attacking midfielder had 13 goals & 13 assists in 34 appearances in all competitions.

Our Young Player Of The Year

View attachment 369511 View attachment 369510

Schumacher was our young player of the year, and also won the Icelandic young player of the year award. The central midfielder was in great form this year.

Icelandic Trophy Winners

Upper League Cup - Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur

Icelandic Champions Cup - Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur

Icelandic Cup - Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur

Icelandic Premier League - Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur

History Up Until Now (23 Years With KR)

YearUpper League CupIcelandic Champions CupIcelandic CupIcelandic Premier LeagueEuropa LeagueChampions League2013Semi-FinalsWinnersWinnersWinners2nd Qualifying RoundN/A2014Semi-FinalsWinnersWinners3rdN/A2nd Qualifying Round2015Quarter FinalsLostQuarter Finals3rd2nd Qualifying RoundN/A2016WinnersN/AWinnersWinnersPlayoff RoundN/A2017WinnersLostWinnersWinnersGroup StagePlayoff Round2018WinnersLostRunners Up2ndGroup StagePlayoff Round2019Quarter FinalsWinnersWinnersWinners3rd Qualifying RoundN/A2020WinnersWinnersWinnersWinnersPlayoff Round3rd Qualifying Round2021Quarter FinalsWinnersWinnersWinnersN/AGroup Stage2022WinnersLost3rd RoundWinnersN/AGroup Stage2023WinnersWinnersWinnersWinners1st Knockout RoundGroup Stage2024WinnersLost3rd RoundWinnersGroup StagePlayoff Round2025WinnersWinners4th RoundWinnersGroup StagePlayoff Round2026WinnersLostWinnersWinnersN/A1st Knockout Round2027WinnersWinnersWinnersWinnersN/A1st Knockout Round2028WinnersWinnersWinnersWinnersN/A1st Knockout Round2029WinnersWinnersQuarter FinalsWinners1st Knockout RoundGroup Stage2030WinnersWinnersWinnersWinners1st Knockout RoundGroup Stage2031WinnersWinnersWinnersWinnersN/ASemi-Finals2032WinnersWinnersWinnersWinnersN/A1st Knockout Round2033WinnersWinners4th RoundWinnersN/A1st Knockout Round2034WinnersWinnersWinnersWinnersN/A1st Knockout Round2035WinnersWinnersWinnersWinnersN/AStill involved

What To Expect In The Next Update

A review of the Champions League group stage.

View attachment 367864

Champions League Journey

We lost 2-0 to Bayern Munich in our first group game. Here's how the other group games went.

Rangers 0-5 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Champions League Group A)

View attachment 367863

A great performance here as we put 5 past Rangers in Glasgow.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 5-0 CFR Cluj (Champions League Group A)

View attachment 367862

Another very good performance here, winning 5-0 against Cluj. 'Olli Nygard' had a great game scoring a hat-trick.

CFR Cluj 0-2 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Champions League Group A)

View attachment 367860

A double from striker 'Jonathan Green' sealed a 2-0 victory in Romania.

Bayern Munich 3-1 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Champions League Group A)

View attachment 367859

Bayern Munich were dominant, and deserved their 3-1 win.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 0-1 Rangers (Champions League Group A)

View attachment 367858

We were poor today. Didn't really create much, and didn't look too good in defence either.

Champions League Group A Table

View attachment 367857

Our performances were a bit hit & miss throughout this group. We finished 2nd and progressed to the knock-out rounds which is the main thing. We will need better performances though if we are to mount a challenge for the Champions League.

What To Expect In The Next Update

A preview of the upcoming season.

View attachment 367752

Pre-Season

Not the busiest of pre-seasons.

No new signings just yet.

Pre-Season Fixtures

Furth 1-1 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur

Astra Giurgiu 0-3 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur

New York 0-3 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur

Seattle 1-3 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur

Fram 1-4 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (For a Fram players testimonial)

Transfer Centre

View attachment 367751

A couple of notable players leave.

Colin Posa joins Italian side Udinese for a fee of £5.25mil. He was no longer a regular starter so it made sense to cash in.

Lars Bo Frandsen joins Swiss giants Grasshoppers for a fee of £3.9mil. The 19 year old never developed so it made sense to sell.

Branko Mikic joins Danish giants FC Kopenhavn for a fee of £2.2mil. He's another 19 year old who never really developed.

What To Expect In The Next Update

The start of the Upper League Cup which I expect to win again.

We play AC Milan in the Champions League 1st knock-out round.

View attachment 367750

February

A fairly short February as usual.

February Fixtures

Valur 0-1 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Upper League Cup Group B)

View attachment 367749

A 1-0 over Valur, but it was a comfortable victory. We were never really under threat.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 1-0 AC Milan (Champions League 1st Knockout Round / First Leg)

View attachment 367748

We managed to grab a very important first leg 1-0 victory. Right-back Patrick Knudsen was the goal-scorer. It was a very even game. We will probably need a goal in the away leg to see ourselves through.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 6-0 Ithrottafelag Reykjavikur (Upper League Cup Group B)

View attachment 367741

An easy victory over much weaker opposition.

Upper League Cup Group B Table

View attachment 367740

Not much to say here..

Player Of The Month

View attachment 367739

Patrick Knudsen, for securing us a first leg win over AC Milan.

What To Expect In The Next Update

Can we see off AC Milan and get to the CL Quarter Finals?

View attachment 367251

March

A busier month.

We get past AC Milan.

March Fixtures

Handknattleiksfelag Kopavogs 0-7 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Upper League Cup Group B)

View attachment 367250

A 'Tor Skippervik' inspired win as the striker nets 5 of our goals.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 4-0 Fimleikafelag Hafnarfjardar (Upper League Cup Group B)

View attachment 367249

A good performance and win over 'FH'.

AC Milan 1-1 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Champions League 1st Knockout Round / Second Leg)

We win 2-1 on aggregate.

View attachment 367248

We get through to the quarter finals of the CL after a nervy 1-1 draw in Milan. We go through 2-1 on aggregate.

Grotta 1-6 Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur (Upper League Cup Group B)

View attachment 367247

Easy win over a much weaker side. Grotta are probably the weakest side in our group.

Knattspyrnufelag Reykjavikur 5-0 Keflavik (Upper League Cup Group B)

View attachment 367246

A good win. 17 year old midfielder 'Isleifur Jonsson' made his debut and bagged a hat-trick. An amazing day for the youngster.

Upper League Cup Group B Table

View attachment 367245

6 wins from 6 in the group as expected.

Player Of The Month

View attachment 367244

It was between 'Olli Nygard' & 'Tor Skippervik'. Olli just edges it after going on a spree of assists.

What To Expect In The Next Update

Up against Bayern Munich in the CL quarter finals.
